Creation date: 07.02.2006

BDC442 submodules (BDC442-3/4/5/6/12

DSQL and implemented new test on markcode 99

31.03.2006 JJ SCR10785 No longer calling step 13

28.03.2006 JJ SCR10745 Fixed bufg flag step 12, added conditions step 1,4,5
01.03.2006 JJ SCR10513 New steps
-- Select only Markcode 99
-- Additional INVO test
... build full where clause

ExpSyntax.val: 'exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DCMC where DCMC_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and DCMC_MARK_CODE = '&Trim (Str ({0,14},'3'))&' and DCMC_SPECIALACCOUNTH <> 0) or DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCC > 0 and DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC < 0 or DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCC < 0 and DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC > 0'
'exists (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_SPECIALACCOUNTZERO = '&'''' &'Y'&'''' &' and INVO_PREVIOUSMARKCODESPEC > 0 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0)'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DEBB_DEBC_NO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR from :1/DEBB, :1/CLNT where (DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH <> 0 or DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCC <> 0) and DEBB_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBB_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and (CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL ='N' or CLNT212_SAF = 'Y') and CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING = 'N' :2 order by DEBB_DEBC_NO for fetch only

Text.val: Control Flags Steps to perform
... selection of DEBC only necessary for the use in step 13
Parameter values, for group suffix
We use group suffix to allow called programs to freely update selected rows
w.o. having to worry about "record has been updated" etc.
LQ will have values of next row, to be on safe side all parameters via virtuals
